title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-7.9 - Text on permitted signs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-7.9 - Text on permitted signs

State Regulations

The text on each sign is subject to approval by the
commission and is limited to: (a) name
or assumed name of the owner of the property on which it is located; (b) principal business or businesses
conducted on the property; (c) brief indication of products or services available; and
(d) (No) Vacancy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
646-7.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
